column1: Smoque BBQ////If it weren't for the hype it MIGHT have gotten five stars
column2: but for all the hype I was expecting something truly amazing.  Don't get me wrong
column3: most of the items were quite good
column4: I'd say the brisket was at the top and the pulled pork was also quite good
column5: but the baby back ribs and some of the sides let me down a little.  A good place worth going to
column6: but not sure it is worth a trip too far out of your way.  Saying that
column7: I do need to get back to this place...
